Block ##dialog-window## —  it's a pop-up window on top of content blocking it, to notify the user or confirmation of his actions

In the simplest case for the use of the block, add the this ##BEMJSON## on page:

%%hl js
    {
        block: 'dialog-window',
        mods: { visibility: 'hidden' },
        content: [
            {
                elem: 'paranja'
            },
            {
                elem: 'inner',
                content: [
                    {
                        elem: 'top-bar',
                        content: [
                            {
                                elem: 'icon'
                            },
                            {
                                elem: 'title',
                                content: ''
                            },
                            {
                                elem: 'button',
                                elemMods: { type: 'close', visibility: 'hidden' },
                                content: '&#10006;'
                            }
                        ]
                    },
                    {
                        elem: 'content',
                        content: ''
                    },
                    {
                        elem: 'button',
                        elemMods: { type: 'submit', visibility: 'hidden' },
                        mix: { block: 'button', mods: { size: 's', color: 'transparent' } },
                        content: 'submit'
                    },
                    {
                        elem: 'button',
                        elemMods: { type: 'cancel', visibility: 'hidden'},
                        mix: { block: 'button', mods: { size: 's', color: 'transparent' } },
                        content: 'cancel'
                    }
                ]
            }
        ]
    }
%%


To show dialog-window use method show:

%%hl js
    BEM.blocks.moda-window.show(title, content, type, buttons, onSubmit, onClose, onCancel);
%%

где title - title of top-bar (string)
    content - dialog-window content (string or ##BEMJSON##)
    buttons: dialog-window buttons: submit, close, cancel array of string)
    type - dialog-window type: error|success|submit|info (string)
    onSubmit, onClose, onCancel: callbacks for appropriate users action (functions)

If you call the "show" a few times before the close of the first window, then turn organized

Also you can force close current dialog-window by "close" method:

%%hl js
    BEM.blocks.moda-window.close();
%%
